format: TypeScript with Vue and Vitest testing framework
description: This file contains a test suite for the Vue component 'HelloWorld' using Vitest testing framework and Vue Test Utils.

methods.name: renders properly
methods.description: Test case verifying that the HelloWorld component renders the text correctly.

ctags.name: wrapper
ctags.pattern: /^    const wrapper = mount(HelloWorld, { props: { msg: 'Hello Vitest' } })$/
